subject: RE: Signed business agreement - GN & Northside Audiology
preview: @jaime here is the updated pricing and filters for the resound range on hearingyou.com.au Can you please action?  We also need to add the Resound logo to the main menu, home page and shop filter like

full_threads.body:
@jaime here is the updated pricing and filters for the resound range on hearingyou.com.au
Can you please action?

We also need to add the Resound logo to the main menu, home page and shop filter like the others. Can you please take care of that?

Hi Heath & Brittany,
Apologies for the delay in getting prices over, I was out of town.

Please find attached pricing and range series.

Kind Regards,

Steven Reinhardt
Director - Audiometrist


Simply better hearing.

Chatswood | Bella Vista | Neutral Bay | Gladesville
www.northsideaudiology.com.au <https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.northsideaudiology.com.au%2F&data=02%7C01%7C%7C4aac1dcd4fcf4d1c59ed08d6fac854e3%7Cf1ed0701294e404ca13bf81f707f845b%7C0%7C1%7C636972135660933895&sdata=bPCnmTmGurHduYk%2FFA4HlteFyILdhgElm4wOxfKiT10%3D&reserved=0>
Tel: 94196999

Northside Audiology is a privately owned, independent company providing diagnostic audiology and rehabilitation services. We are not owned by, or aligned with, any hearing device manufacturer. We access hearing aids and implantable devices from a number of manufacturers based on our client’s needs and preferences. Our audiologists do not receive any commission or incentive for fitting particular devices.


From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Sent: Friday, 7 August 2020 4:27 PM
To: Brittany Grimble <brittany@practiceedge.com.au <mailto:brittany@practiceedge.com.au>>
Cc: Steven Reinhardt <steven@northsideaudiology.com.au <mailto:steven@northsideaudiology.com.au>>; Jeff & Lindsay Reinhardt <home@reinhardts.net <mailto:home@reinhardts.net>>
Subject: Re: Signed business agreement - GN & Northside Audiology

Hi Brittany,

Yes, sure, I’m just waiting until the pricing and information is finalised before adding these products to the menu and filters.

Speak soon,
Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>

<https://wolfiq.com.au/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Signature&utm_campaign=WolfIQ>

Hey Guys,
With the brand drop down option also be updated to reflect the addition of Resound?


<Screen Shot 2020-08-07 at 4.21.53 pm.png>
Thanks
Brittany

Sent: Friday, 7 August 2020 4:21 PM
To: Steven Reinhardt <steven@northsideaudiology.com.au <mailto:steven@northsideaudiology.com.au>>
Cc: Brittany Grimble <brittany@practiceedge.com.au <mailto:brittany@practiceedge.com.au>>; Jeff & Lindsay Reinhardt <home@reinhardts.net <mailto:home@reinhardts.net>>
Subject: Re: Signed business agreement - GN & Northside Audiology

Hi Steven,

Further to my last email, here are the links:

· https://hearingyou.com.au/product/linx-quattro-9-rechargable-rie/ <https://hearingyou.com.au/product/linx-quattro-9-rechargable-rie/>
· https://hearingyou.com.au/product/linx-quattro-9-mini-rie/ <https://hearingyou.com.au/product/linx-quattro-9-mini-rie/>
· https://hearingyou.com.au/product/linx-quattro-7-rechargable/ <https://hearingyou.com.au/product/linx-quattro-7-rechargable/>
· https://hearingyou.com.au/product/linx-quattro-7-mini-rie/ <https://hearingyou.com.au/product/linx-quattro-7-mini-rie/>
· https://hearingyou.com.au/product/linx-quattro-5-rechargable/ <https://hearingyou.com.au/product/linx-quattro-5-rechargable/>
· https://hearingyou.com.au/product/linx-quattro-5-mini-rie/ <https://hearingyou.com.au/product/linx-quattro-5-mini-rie/>
·
We will also need to know the items:

Range (Premium, advanced, economy, essential)
Price
And if they are rechargeable and have telecoil

We have added all of the colours swatches available on their website. Note they didn’t supply an image of each model in the available colours. Please ask them for these if you would like them added to the site.

Thanks,
Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>

Hi Heath, Brittany & Jeff,

Hope all is well with you. Please can we add these product portfolios to the hearing you site.

thanks & regards

Steve


Begin forwarded message:

From: Frans Rosenørn Kaastrup-Olsen <folsen@gnresound.com <mailto:folsen@gnresound.com>>
Subject: RE: Signed business agreement - GN & Northside Audiology
Date: 6 August 2020 at 4:41:00 pm AEST
To: "steven@northsideaudiology.com.au <mailto:steven@northsideaudiology.com.au>" <steven@northsideaudiology.com.au <mailto:steven@northsideaudiology.com.au>>
Cc: Lisa McBride <lmcbride@gnresound.com <mailto:lmcbride@gnresound.com>>

Hi Steven,

Find our suggestion for “Hearing you” website. We have focused on Quattro and Resound and will update for Beltone with the newest info once we are “allowed”.
The links in the file, is through wetransfer, which expires in 7 days.

Please let us know if you want something else – once your website goes live we can also compare to the info on the other brands and ensure it is aligned.

Also did you get a chance to look at when a training on our newest technology would fit in September?

Thanks.

Kind regards
Frans

From: Frans Rosenørn Kaastrup-Olsen
Sent: 4. august 2020 14:58
To: 'steven@northsideaudiology.com.au <mailto:steven@northsideaudiology.com.au>' <steven@northsideaudiology.com.au <mailto:steven@northsideaudiology.com.au>>
Cc: Lisa McBride <lmcbride@gnresound.com <mailto:lmcbride@gnresound.com>>
Subject: Signed business agreement - GN & Northside Audiology

Hi Steven,

Thanks for having us last week.

As a follow-up, find attached the signed business agreement between NS Audiology and GN. If you could sign it and return it, then we will get it processed in our system.

I am a bit delayed with the input for the “Hearing you” website but should have the remaining input from Marketing by Thursday latest.
We are completing your template for both Resound and Beltone in the 3 highest product levels, reflecting both our Mini RIE and our rechargeable model, if any thoughts on that then please me know.

In regards to organizing a product training more tailored to the future as we discussed, would sometime in the 1st or 2nd week of September work for you?

Kind regards
Frans

Frans Rosenoern Kaastrup-Olsen
Business Development Manager - ANZ

M: +61 426 257 736 | D: +61 1800 658 955 | folsen@gnresound.com <mailto:folsen@gnresound.com>
